1.texto: Charm and grace may hide a foul heart.

Cast Assassin's Blade only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.

Destroy target nonblack attacking creature.

3.texto: Don't be fooled by their looks. Think of them as little knives with wings.

4.descricao: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
4.texto: Those who live amid decay must expect scavengers.

5.descricao: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
5.texto: It moved through the troops leaving no footprints, save on their souls.

6.descricao: Whenever Charging Bandits attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
6.texto: The fear in their victims' eyes is their most cherished reward.

7.texto: "I say victory is better than honor."

8.descricao: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

9.descricao: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
9.texto: The more you pay for the lesson, the better you'll remember it.

10.descricao: Black creatures you control can't be blocked this turn except by black creatures.
10.texto: "As equal were their souls, so equal was their fate." —John Dryden, "Ode to Mrs. Anne Killigrew"

11.descricao:
Flying

When Dread Reaper enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

12.descricao: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
12.texto: A fist of dust to line your throat, a bowl of sand to fill your belly.

13.descricao:
Flying

When Ebon Dragon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

14.descricao: When Endless Cockroaches dies, return it to its owner's hand.

15.texto: Not all shadows are cast by light—some are cast by darkness.

16.descricao:
As an additional cost to cast Final Strike, sacrifice a creature.

Final Strike deals damage to target opponent equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

regras.texto: You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

17.descricao: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

regras.texto: A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.

18.texto: Death claims all but the darkest souls.

19.texto: Death claims all but the darkest souls.

20.descricao: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
20.texto: I howl my soul to the moon, and the moon howls with me.

21.descricao: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
21.texto: Fear is as effective a weapon as the blade.

22.descricao: When Mercenary Knight enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

23.descricao: Target opponent discards a card at random.
23.texto: To dodge the unerring knife, one must be free of thought.

25.texto: The difference between a nuisance and a threat is often merely a matter of numbers.

26.texto: One chill blast—the exhalation of the grave.

27.descricao: When Noxious Toad dies, each opponent discards a card.

28.texto: What could it have swallowed to grow so large?

29.texto: When emotions rain down, what rivers will be born?

30.descricao: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
30.texto: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

regras.texto: You must show the card you bring out of the graveyard to your opponent.
The creature being brought back is chosen on announcement and not on resolution of the spell because it is targeted.
A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.

31.descricao: When Serpent Assassin enters the battlefield, you may destroy target nonblack creature.

32.descricao: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

regras.texto: You can cast this if you have less than 3 life, since the life is lost as an effect and not a payment.

33.texto: The less flesh there is, the more teeth there seem to be.

34.texto: They watched as the snake shed layer after layer until only cold bone remained.

35.descricao: Soul Shred deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
35.texto: It would be a shame to let life slip away to nothing.

36.descricao: When Undying Beast dies, put it on top of its owner's library.

37.descricao: Vampiric Feast deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.
37.texto: It's not always gold the thief is after.

38.descricao: Vampiric Touch deals 2 damage to target opponent and you gain 2 life.
38.texto: A touch, not comforting, but of death.

39.texto: All must fall, and those who stand highest fall hardest.

40.descricao: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

41.descricao: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

regras.texto: If there are less than 7 cards in the library, look at all of them. Put two into your hand, and the rest in the graveyard.
This is not considered a draw or a discard.

42.descricao: If target opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

regras.texto: The number of cards is counted during resolution.

43.descricao: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Mountain and red card in it.

44.descricao: {T}: Capricious Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

regras.texto: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

45.descricao:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

Draw a card.
45.texto: A thousand feathers from a thousand birds, sewn with magic and song.

Flying

Flying

Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.

regras.texto: If it loses Flying, it will be unable to block any creatures.

49.descricao:
Cast Command of Unsummoning only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.

Return one or two target attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

50.texto: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.

51.descricao: Look at the top five cards of target opponent's library. Put one of those cards into that player's graveyard and the rest on top of his or her library in any order.

52.descricao: Deep-Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
52.texto: Sailors fear the deep-sea serpent; others thank the gods it has no legs.

53.descricao: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
53.texto: The past is a mirror of the future.

54.texto: Once they learn the trick of carrying their own lamps, they never touch the ground again.

55.descricao: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

regras.texto: The creatures and lands are only prevented from untapping during the targeted player's next untap step. They can still can untap during other player's untap steps.
No creatures or lands controlled by the player will untap during his or her next untap step. This includes those which entered the battlefield after Exhaustion resolved.

56.descricao:
Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.

Draw a card.

regras.texto: The discard is forced even though you choose how many to discard.
Each player chooses how many cards he or she would like to discard. That number may be 0.

57.texto: At the sight of the thing the calamari vendor's eyes went wide, but from fear or avarice none could tell.

58.texto: Its spear has no shaft, its shield no handle.

Flying

When Ingenious Thief enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand.

60.descricao: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

regras.texto: It can choose itself. It has to if there are no other creatures.

61.texto: Are merfolk humans with fins, or are humans merfolk with feet?

Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.

Draw a card.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

66.texto: The phantom warrior comes from nowhere and returns there just as quickly.

regras.texto: If both players run out of cards during this effect, the game is a draw.

Look at target opponent's hand.

Draw a card.

84.texto: Stay alert: his lumbering may shake the ground itself, but in water, he glides.

85.texto: A rhino rarely uses its horn to announce its charge, only to end it.

Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

88.texto: "Hear that? No? That's a cat warrior."

89.descricao: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
89.texto: Elves know where to harvest the best of the forest, for they planted it themselves.

90.texto: It's up to you if you enter their woods—and up to them if you leave.

91.descricao: You gain 1 life for each Forest on the battlefield.
91.texto: Come to these woods and suffer no pain; you've burdens to lose and new life to gain.

92.descricao: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
92.texto: It's not far into the trap, as the crow flies.

regras.texto: This card now uses the Reach keyword ability to enable the blocking of flying creatures. This works because a creature with flying can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.

93.texto: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

94.texto: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.

95.descricao: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

regras.texto: Whether or not a creature has flying is only checked on resolution.

96.texto: The lion's only loyalty is to its hunger.

97.texto: A rested mind is the sharpest weapon.

99.texto: Some cats are born fighters; others need a little persuading.

"I am that merry wanderer of the night."
—William Shakespeare,
A Midsummer Night's Dream

101.descricao:
As an additional cost to cast Natural Order, sacrifice a green creature.

Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

regras.texto: The sacrifice of a green creature is part of the cost and is paid on casting. You do not have a choice to pay this cost zero times or more than one time in order to multiply the effect.
You do not have to find a green creature card if you do not want to.

102.texto: Though many have come to this place to wash their wounds, the water has never turned red.

103.descricao: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn.

104.descricao: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
104.texto: Nature's secrets can be read on every tree, every branch, every leaf.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

You can find any card with the land type Forest, including Snow-Covered Forest or non-Basic lands like Tropical Island, Murmuring Bosk, or Stomping Ground. You can even find a card that is a land in addition to other types, such as Dryad Arbor.

105.descricao: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

106.texto: The dogs of war are nothing compared to the cats.

107.descricao: When Plant Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.

108.descricao: When Primeval Force enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice three Forests.

109.texto: The soldiers chopped and chopped, and still the great tree stood, frowning down at them.

110.texto: One of the forest's best protectors is the forest itself.

111.texto: It has more teeth than fit in its mouth.

112.texto: No one is happy when they notice a tiger.

113.descricao: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

regras.texto: This spell increases the number of lands you can play in a turn. The land cards are played as you would normally play lands.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

—Italian proverb

Flying

132.texto: The snake's final thrashings only spread the fire within it.

regras.texto: You divide the damage as you cast Forked Lightning, not as it resolves. Each target you choose must be assigned at least 1 damage.

136.texto: It's easy to stand head and shoulders over those with no backbone.

137.texto: Though slow-witted and slow-moving, they are quick to anger.

138.texto: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot!

139.texto: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

140.texto: The bigger they are, the harder they avoid work.

141.descricao: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

142.descricao: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
142.texto: Swing your axe as a broom, to sweep away the foe.

143.texto: People ran as never before at the thought of being buried and cremated at the same time.

144.texto: Don't let its appearance frighten you. Let its claws and teeth do that.

145.texto: The herd's patience, the stampede's fury.

146.texto: Only the heroic and the mad follow mountain goat trails.

It pelts the land with its fury,
spoiling what was once sweet.

regras.texto: You must target two different lands. You can't choose to target just one.

When Alabaster Dragon dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.

regras.texto: This will always be shuffled into its owner's library.

173.texto: A true warrior's thoughts are of victory, not death.

178.texto: Infantry deployment is the art of putting your troops in the wrong place at the right time.

regras.texto: Gift of Estates does nothing if each of your opponents has the same number of lands or fewer as you.
You can find nonbasic lands if they have the Plains land type, such as dual lands (Tundra, et al).

This turn, whenever an attacking creature deals combat damage to you, it deals that much damage to its controller.

regras.texto: If the spell fails because the target is not there or isn't legal, the owner does not gain any life.

185.texto: Dawn brings a new day, and a new day brings hope.
